name: JEFF KEARNEY
text: Terrible!!! Called and made an order, half hour later I went to pick up my pizza and it was never made and the ticket was still in the cash register printout. You just lost a customer and anyone else I know. If I could give them a 0 star I would. No photo from No pizza!!!

name: Chuck Lowrie
text: After ordering the family deal, they told us they were out of Italian sausage. Big disappointment. The small pizza was to be cheese only. It had pepperoni on it.

name: Stacia Ireland
text: This Toarmina's pizza has REALLY GREAT pizza! I'm not about the giant pizza, but I love this place for the quality and freshness of their pizza toppings.  I love a cheesy pizza, and they never skimp on the cheese here. Ground beef is â€¦More

name: Anastassia Kondratenkova
text: Extremely good bread; the pizza is so-so. Service was amazing.

name: Blahblah Blacksheep
text: Boss did not wear face mask correctly, had his nose sticking out, pulled it all the way down to talk to a person. Employee did not wear face mask at all because she was not trained nor informed of the biological risk of using only a â€¦More
Pizza was great, the Italian sub was delicious, fair prices & the delivery driver was friendly

name: DecisiveElement
text: Their pizzas are great! Not greasy and the amount of cheese, toppings, and sauce is just right. Definitely recommend.

name: Jeffrey Pieske
text:
They have the BEST pizza. I love that 24 inch. Can't quite eat the whole thing yet, but I keep trying. Really good grinders and ribs also.
The delivery drivers that I have had are quite friendly. But the main reason I â€¦More

text: Food was great, the delivery guy Lawrence was even better

name: Cynthia Williams
text: This place is simply delicious. Had one problem one time and the manager Chris was quick to respond and not only he make everything better the fact that he did it without hesitation or an attitude made it all that much better. The pizza is â€¦More

name: Matthew Soellner
text: My family really loves their pizza, breadsticks and calzones.  The sauce is delicious! â€¦More

name: Gavin Staples
text: The manager was very friendly and helped me pick a good deal. The pizza is amazing. Probably the best in the area. Everything is fresh and cooked perfectly. Please go give it a try!

name: Dylan Vun cannon
text: By far my favorite pizza place in Ann Arbor, period! Iâ€™m new to the city, and a coworker of mine introduced me to Toarminas my first week. Immediately fell in love; the customer service is phenomenal, quality of pizza is fantastic, and â€¦More

name: Caleb Foster
text: Im actually happy with their new change into what they currently are. They have some of the best take out lasagna with great portion sizes. Now one of my go to spots. The staff here has always been great as well! For a take out Italian place it exceeded my expectations.

name: Jason Vrane
text: Tried my first calzone here and it was delicious. Dipped it in the tasty pizza sauce!

name: Ryan Hendrickson
text: First time having pizza at this chain. Excellent 16" 3-topping.
